pages.text: The Aquatic Entangler is a device that can passively catch fish when it is placed in a body of water. The rate at which it catches fish depends on the biome, weather, and augment configuration, but it has a base rate of 1 catch every few minutes. $(l:thermal:technology/augments/integral_components)Integral components$(/l) and $(l:thermal:technology/augments/area_radius)radial enhancement$(/l) can speed this up. It can optionally take $(l:thermal:world/materials/bait)bait$(/l) to boost its rate or alter which items it catches.

pages.title: Aquatic Entangler
pages.text: The entangler will also net (pun intended) 1-3 exp for every catch if the $(l:thermal:technology/augments/xp_storage)knowledge concentrator$(/l) augment is installed.
